title: Charging process - how many electrons in 40 nC

content.question: Approximately how many electrons were transferred between the rod and the sphere?

choices.label: <math alttext="4.0 times 10 raised to the negative 8 power" overflow="scroll"><mn>4.0</mn><mo>×</mo><msup><mn>10</mn><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>8</mn></mrow></msup></math>
